name: Slappy's Day Out
description:
## SHE’S JUST GETTING STARTED…

Slappy prefers to spend her days playing Mahjong with the other retirees at the local senior center. But when one of her friends is having trouble drawing her pension, Slappy senses an opportunity to pull another run. Getting a team together, she takes to the streets, utilizing her unique skills to deliver retribution to a corp that’s ripping off thousands of people and put some nuyen in her pocket at the same time.
